original_text: ‘Do not try to stop him,’ Jesus said, ‘If someone is not against you, he is working to help you.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 금하지 말라 너희를 반대하지 않는 자는 너희를 위하는 자니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Do not try to stop him
If someone is not against you
he is working to help you
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너를 도와주는 일을 하고 있는 것이다
